item.title: Bauhinia CTF 2023: How to Stop Time
item.description: After four years of team formation, we organized our first edition of Bauhinia CTF last weekend. There are over 650 teams registered and over 200 teams scored. This year, I made one crypto challenge, How to Stop Time. I also coauthored a web/crypto challenge, Amnesia, with @chthollic_. This post is served as a short writeup of How to Stop Time, a crypto challenge with six solves during the contest period.
